name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
about: A rich, slow-cooked meat sauce served over al dente spaghetti. This classic Italian dish is perfect for family dinners and gets even better the next day.
steps: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add onions and cook until soft.
Add garlic and ground beef. Cook until browned, breaking up lumps with a spoon.
Stir in tomato paste and oregano. Cook for 1 minute.
Add canned tomatoes and season with salt and pepper. Simmer for at least 30 minutes until thick.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Toss pasta with the sauce and serve with fresh basil and parmesan.

comments.text: Added a splash of red wine, delicious!
